name: Simple Sequence
description: Demonstrates a basic sequence that executes actions in order

description: Demonstrates a selector that tries children until one succeeds

description: Demonstrates retry decorator for handling failures

description: Demonstrates parallel execution of multiple tasks

name: Robot Patrol
description: Autonomous robot patrol behavior with battery management

description: Demonstrates debugging features: breakpoints, watches, and step execution

description: Game AI decision tree for NPC behavior with combat and exploration

description: Large tree for performance and stress testing

name: Day in the Life Simulation
description: Complex simulation of a person's day with hunger, thirst, energy, stress, and time management

name: Guard Patrol Game
description: Interactive 2D grid game with guard NPCs patrolling, investigating, and chasing intruders

description: Comprehensive demonstration showcasing decorators, parallel execution, status converters, and blackboard operations

name: Smart Home Automation - A Day in the Life
description: Smart home simulation with conditional logic based on time, location, occupancy, and ambient light
